name: Escape Voltage
description:
This is my solo entry into the Go Godot Jam 2 gamejam

Instructions

WSAD/Arrow Keys to move or right stick on your controller

So long as your electrical tendrils are making contact, you can move in any direction.

Touching  objects / walls with your core will discharge power, you can gain power by sucking it out of electrical devices that your tendrils touch but they only have a limited amount of resistance before they break.

Just being alive drains power slowly and avoids other hazards like water, these will catastrophically discharge you.

Your goal is to escape alive, without alerting too much attention to your presence.

3rd party assets used Graphics

Smoke Aura - Beast - https://opengameart.org/content/smoke-aura

Fonts

C64 TrueType (TTF) Fonts - C64_Pro-STYLE.TTF - https://style64.org/c64-truetype

Sounds

Electric Sparks, Railway, A.wav - InspectorJ - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/412313/

Footsteps on concrete - florianreichelt - https://freesound.org/people/florianreichelt/sounds/459964/

JacobsLadderSingle2.flac - Halleck - https://freesound.org/people/Halleck/sounds/19487/

Heavy Rain - lebaston100 - https://freesound.org/people/lebaston100/sounds/243629/

Old Door-Knob and Open WITH Squeek - lonemonk - https://freesound.org/people/lonemonk/sounds/352383/

All other assets are my own creation.
